howIWork.title: How I Work
howIWork.step1Desc: In the first stage, we'll have a Discovery Call to discuss your goals, needs, and project requirements.
howIWork.step2Desc: I'll create a detailed proposal outlining the project scope, timeline, and deliverables.
howIWork.step3Desc: This is where the magic happens! I'll design and build your project with attention to detail.
howIWork.step4Desc: Rigorous testing ensures everything works perfectly. We'll review together before launch.
howIWork.step5Desc: Your project goes live! I'll provide support during the launch and be available for any questions.
